sentences.sContent: These statistics grossly misrepresent the reality.
sentences.sCn: 这些统计资料严重歪曲了实际情况。

synos.tran: 歪曲，误传；不合适地代表

remMethod.val: mis(错误) + represent(表示) → 表示错误 → 歪曲

trans.tranCn: 歪曲， 不如实地叙述
trans.tranOther: to deliberately give a wrong description of someone’s opinions or of a situation
